# Placeholder â€” Vendor Quotes (Fleet / Facility / Equipment)

**Status:** NOT PROVIDED YET (offline item)

## What to store here
Add one file per quote under this folder, e.g.:
- `YYYYMMDD_vendor_truck_lease_quote.pdf`
- `YYYYMMDD_vendor_baler_quote.pdf`
- `YYYYMMDD_broker_warehouse_offer.pdf`

## Minimum fields the quote should show
- Item/specs
- Price and deposit
- Term and payment schedule
- Maintenance/warranty
- Delivery lead time

## How it closes diligence
These quotes validate:
- Fleet lease/operator assumptions (`CLAIM-LEASE-001`, `CLAIM-LEASE-PARTNER-001`)
- Facility rent/deposit (`CLAIM-RENT-001`)
- Equipment cost (`CLAIM-SCALE-001`, baler assumptions)
